mapper.select: SELECT QSTN_NO AS "qstnNo", USER_NM AS "userNm", QSTN_TTL AS "qstnTtl", QSTN_CN AS "qstnCn", QSTN_INQ_CNT AS "qstnInqCnt", QSTN_WRT_DATE AS "qstnWrtDate" FROM QSTN, USERS WHERE QSTN.USER_NO = USERS.USER_NO AND QSTN.QSTN_NO =#{qstnNo}

SELECT QSTN_FILE_NO AS "qstnFileNo", QSTN_NO AS "qstnNo", QSTN_FILE_PHYS_NM AS "qstnFilePhysNm", QSTN_FILE_ACTL_NM AS "qstnFileActlNm", QSTN_FILE_EXTN_NM AS "qstnFileExtnNm" FROM QSTN_FILE WHERE QSTN_NO = #{qstnNo}

SELECT QSTN_FILE_NO AS "qstnFileNo", QSTN_NO AS "qstnNo", QSTN_FILE_PHYS_NM AS "qstnFilePhysNm", QSTN_FILE_ACTL_NM AS "qstnFileActlNm", QSTN_FILE_EXTN_NM AS "qstnFileExtnNm" FROM QSTN_FILE WHERE QSTN_FILE_NO = #{qstnFileNo}

SELECT QSTN_CMNT_NO AS qstnCmntNo, QSTN_NO AS qstnNo, QC.USER_NO AS userNo, QSTN_CMNT_CN AS qstnCmntCn, QSTN_CMNT_DATE AS qstnCmntDate, USER_NM AS userNm FROM QSTN_COMMENT QC, USERS U WHERE QC.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND QC.QSTN_NO = #{qstnNo} ORDER BY QSTN_CMNT_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QSTN_FILE(QSTN_FILE_NO, QSTN_NO, QSTN_FILE_PHYS_NM, QSTN_FILE_ACTL_NM, QSTN_FILE_EXTN_NM) VALUES(QSTNFILENO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, QSTNNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{qstnFilePhysNm}, #{qstnFileActlNm}, #{qstnFileExtnNm})
mapper.select: select rownum, QSTN_CMNT_NO AS qstnCmntNo, QSTN_NO AS qstnNo, aa.USER_NO AS userNo, QSTN_CMNT_CN AS qstnCmntCn, QSTN_CMNT_DATE AS qstnCmntDate, USER_NM AS userNm from(SELECT rownum, QSTN_CMNT_NO , QSTN_NO, QC.USER_NO, QSTN_CMNT_CN, QSTN_CMNT_DATE, USER_NM FROM QSTN_COMMENT QC, USERS U WHERE QC.USER_NO = U.USER_NO order by qstn_cmnt_no desc)aa where rownum = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QSTN_COMMENT WHERE QSTN_NO = #{qstnNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE QSTN_COMMENT set QSTN_CMNT_CN = #{qstnCmntCn}, QSTN_CMNT_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE QSTN_CMNT_NO = #{qstnCmntNo}
